html:
1.21.20  2:25 pm   what is your favourite song

     surprise me

     and why?

     that's just how favorites are made

1.21.20  2:24 pm   let's say, for every project, X time is spent on sound and Y time is spent on looks. what was your average ratio of X to Y for projects in the late 2018 era?

     50:50

      what would you LIKE the ratio to be for this new era?

     50:50

1.21.20  1:27 pm   When do you answer questions?

     Wednesday, January 22, 2020 8:10:59 AM, for example

1.21.20  1:25 pm   Favorite type of freight car? (i.e. boxcar, tanker, gondola, etc.)

     whichever one is the longest

1.21.20  1:24 pm   Favourite movie

     surprise me

1.21.20  1:16 pm   isnt toast just hot stale bread?

     no

1.21.20  12:52 pm   your videos are the best

     we'll see about that

1.21.20  12:43 pm   what is the most common question

     that's true

1.21.20  12:14 pm   you are a diamond

     we'll see about that

1.21.20  12:05 pm   Have you wondered who you were in a past life?
And have you wondered who will you be in a new life?

     yes

1.21.20  11:50 am   i wanna get a scholarship, what do you reccomend me to do?

     now you are supposed to be a scholar

1.21.20  11:45 am   Are you going to make a new jingle so it can be your favorite?

     yes but not for long. gonna make another one after that

1.21.20  11:37 am   I can not find my question.What should i do?

     it's right here

1.21.20  11:31 am   I need the planet Mars to make some bread. Any ideas on how to retrieve it from the sky? Asking for a friend.

     see if you can have your friend do it

1.21.20  11:21 am   what is an uppercase letter

     pure joy and fun

1.21.20  10:52 am   what do you think

     1=2

1.21.20  10:43 am   what is the worsted thing ever

     ordinary things

1.21.20  10:38 am   Do you actually like listening to your own music?

     too scary, knowing that i'm responsible

1.21.20  10:26 am   instead of starting my day with advice from the bible i like advice by bill :)

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

1.21.20  10:09 am   why are you so cyute

     that is due to how incredibly normal and average i am. i can strike up conversations, almost daily

1.21.20  10:07 am   Got your songs stuck, not in my head but in my heart. I love your work bill✨ 

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

1.21.20  10:04 am   whats the correct way to fold a fitted bedsheet

     around the edges of the bed

1.21.20  10:04 am   why don't you capitalize the first letter

     why would i,....... and why don't you

1.21.20  9:11 am   I'm making some music on my computer but it always sounds really empty and hollow, do you ever get that

     yes

      and if so what do you usually do?

     briefly hit rock bottom and then remember how many times i've overcome this before

1.21.20  9:10 am   I've got so many questions that I forgot what to ask, what do I do?

     you can copy someone else's question

1.21.20  9:09 am   does life have a meaning or are we just a randy blob?

     both life and randy blobs have meaning

1.21.20  8:26 am   tell people that the timestamps are when the questions were asked not when they were answered and that you get plenty of sleep therefore there is no need to worry.

     there will be plenty of time to tell them later

1.21.20  7:57 am   Why were previous questions asked on the first day of the 20th month when we only have 12 months?

     they were not

1.21.20  7:08 am   potato or cucumber

     if you need it to catch the sunlight in that certain way, you must try potato. potatoes are very reflective

1.21.20  6:44 am   What's the time?

     Tuesday, January 21, 2020 10:56:18 AM

1.21.20  5:59 am   what's your favourite disease

     infinity

      and why?

     it is both my old and new friend, simultaneously

1.21.20  5:28 am   What video do you think is the most "unique"

     roundhay garden scene

1.21.20  5:25 am   can you spell?

     i will try

1.21.20  5:21 am   Can you write a poem for what ever you want and read it for us? 

     no, i think poems are best read directly by the viewer. if you put voice to it then i think it would have to be called something more than a poem

1.21.20  5:21 am   thoughts on chicago?

     ever had a slice of pizza shaped like a mattress

1.21.20  5:07 am   if you were me would you watch you too?

     i'm not sure. that would be you also, which in that case would be myself

1.21.20  4:39 am   Will you ever compile the best ueqstions into a book? You can call it ueqstions by billwurtz

      making a physical book from an ongoing stream of content is awkward. for example, i have a book of all the #1 hit singles since 1950, and it mysteriously ends at 2003

1.21.20  1:55 am   do you find online metronomes to be reliable?

     that seems unnecessarily dicey, especially considering how extraordinarily easy it is to make an offline metronome

1.21.20  1:10 am   What type of music did you grow up with?

     put it this way, i still have no idea if i am supposed to be northern or southern

1.21.20  12:50 am   i've seen that you mentioned your video style will be different after learning how to use all of those programs, but how different do you think it will be?

     you will most surely still recognize me

1.21.20  12:15 am   Would you say time and space have a big impact on you?

     yes

1.20.20  11:58 pm   hi bill. i've been producing a couple short videos (like 1-3 seconds) and i keep feeling like the pacing's all wrong and everything happens at the wrong times. it's a bit hard to control due to hardware restrictions on my video editing process (performance is bad and previewing is hard). your short videos are timed really well and i wondered if you have any tips on how to make my things less bad?

     you are on the right track with starting with short videos. but if it's still difficult, especially with timing, then you definitely need to go even shorter

1.20.20  11:26 pm   Are you a communist spy planning on taking over New York?

     that sounds like a good idea but maybe some other time

1.20.20  10:52 pm   I am going to eat a piano 

     i think you are bluffing

1.20.20  10:32 pm   have you considered lifting weights?

     yes

1.20.20  9:37 pm   Are  you on any sort of mind altering substance s

     sometimes it's interesting to use my mind to alter substances

1.20.20  9:15 pm   How do you make your videos

     we'll see

1.20.20  9:14 pm   Top 10 people

     you are all 10

1.20.20  8:49 pm   Opinion on giraffes?

     too short

1.20.20  8:48 pm   How to stop procrastinating? Or at least make it happen less? 

     there will be plenty of time to procrastinate later
